title: Exclusive | Paytm Payments Bank may approach RBI for small finance bank licence by June - Moneycontrol
content: Exclusive | Paytm Payments Bank may approach RBI for small finance bank licence by June  Moneycontrol
description: Paytm Payments Bank commenced operations on May 23, 2017. It will be eligible to apply for a small finance bank licence by May-June, say sources.
